entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:03 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 5:30 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -13.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -18.8°C
Wind: NW 37 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15 except minus 19 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy except cloudy in onshore winds with flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15 except minus 19 inland. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud except cloudy in onshore winds with flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 18 inland. POP 40%
